physical_appearance:This is a photograph of the Harmonie Society clubhouse on the left
 and the Oger Freres tailor house on the right. The road in the photograph crosses over the Ciliwung River
 seen on the left. The buildings have a neoclassical colonial architecture style. The edges of the photographs are rounded. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Harmonie Society clubhouse on the left, and the Oger Freres tailor house on the right. The road in the photograph crosses over the Ciliwung River, seen on the left. The buildings have a neoclassical colonial architecture style. The edges of the photographs are rounded. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
